news.title: Google Explains Discovery & Refresh Data in Crawl Stats Report
news.description: Discovered URLs were crawled by Google for the first time, while refreshed URLs had been previously crawled but were crawled again to update information in Googleâ€™s search index.

news.title: Google December 2020 Core Update Is Now Fully Rolled Out
news.description: This global update had a significant impact, resulting in gains or declines of 10 percent to over 100 percent of previous levels of search traffic for sites in many regions and categories.

news.title: YouTube Remains Dominant Source of Video in Top Google Ranking Positions
news.description: Although Google has denied that it gives a preference to YouTube over other video content, a study found that over 80 percent of videos in its search results carousel come from YouTube.

news.title: Google on Penalizing Misinformation
news.description: Marketing insiders have questioned why Google applies only automated penalties to sites that spread misinformation, while it applies both automated and manual penalties to spam.
